knimeNode.name: LAPMergeSplitter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Does the merging and splitting steps of the LAP tracker.

fullDescription.intro: Takes the tracklets and checks if their start or end nodes should be merged with another tracklet. This could be if a spot splitted from one frame to the next or if two spots merge into one in the next frame. If splits or merges are found those two tracklets are merged to one.
fullDescription.option: the threshold used for the merging step
the threshold used for the splitting step
the threshold used for the calculation if an edge is valid
